Category:Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures

nodes.text: The High Republic Adventures Free Comic Book Day 2021

The High Republic Adventures Free Comic Book Day 2021 is an upcoming one-shot issue that will serve as a prelude to the canon comic book series Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures. The issue will be written by Daniel José Older and published as a Free Comic Book Day title on August 14, 2021 by IDW Publishing.

Join Yoda, Buckets o'Blood, and their Padawan learners as they go on an adventure to help maintain peace during the glory days of the Republic, in a prelude to IDW's Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures series! Written by series architect Daniel José Older, this is the ideal entry into the world of the High Republic-and a can't-miss story for fans!
